name: Phaser 3 Game
description:
This is my first game made with Phaser 3 and Grunt! Click here to learn how to make a similar game!

Instructions

  • Arrow Up: Jump
  • Arrow Left and Arrow Right: Move left and right, respectively
  • Collect stars to get points
  • Avoid bombs. A bomb will be spawned every time you collect all the stars. Be careful!
  • Get a shield to protect you from a bomb. Warning: it will disappear after 10 seconds or you getting hit by a bomb.

Hope you enjoy this simple game! Get as many stars as you can!
